text: For example, this one has lazy by default. But, it loads as soon as the page loads, along with all the rest in that row.
I haven't experienced this but here is something you might try. <https://web.dev/browser-level-image-lazy-loading/#images-should-include-dimension-attributes>
Thanks! That’s what I’m doing, also. I think I have to work this with the theme provider more closely. I appreciate it!
